text: Are there any tricks to properly align Tag components with Text? I feel like they always end up in a weird place no matter where I put them.
Hey <@U05KNCMAE7N>. We’ve been very excited about the prospects of playing with something like this, so we’d be very interested in participating.
Amazing!! Will send you the instructions soon
Hey Jae - unfortunately, multiple lines of text that I would like to wrap. I’ll see if I can design something nice looking with Flex instead. Thanks!
Thanks for the follow-up! Would you say that you're looking to have a Tag inline at the front of some text?

What are roles? I see it when dumping context. I thought it was permission sets, but that didn't populate it. Being a sysadmin doesn't populate it either. Not sure how to control this field or what it's for.
